## DefinedService type

A service factory returned by `defineService()`<!-- -->.

Has a `.create(deps)` method that wires dependencies. This is what you pass to `compose()`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DefinedService<TDeps = unknown> = Service<ServiceDefinition<string, TDeps>, TDeps>;
```
**References:** [Service](./service/)<!-- -->, [ServiceDefinition](./servicedefinition/)

## Example


```ts
// Signal() returns DefinedService
const signalFactory: DefinedService = Signal();

// Used with compose
const ctx = compose({ signal: signalFactory }, deps);
```
